text:
ay I need an assisted 
vaginal delivery?
The following are the more 
common reasons why an 
assisted vaginal delivery may 
be recommended.
• You have been pushing for 
too long.
• You may have run out of 
energy to deliver your baby 
safely.
• Your baby’s heart rate may 
be going above or below 
normal levels or they may 
not be getting enough 
oxygen.
Sometimes, if you have 
high blood pressure, your 
obstetrician may recommend 
an assisted vaginal delivery 
if the second stage of labour 
goes
